channel.title: Comments on: #50startups: Goodkid Foods Takes the Sugar Out of Snack Bars

item.title: By: E'lan Buendia
item.dc:creator: E'lan Buendia
item.description: Hmmm...I backed Good Kid, along w. others, of course, on Kickstarter...and for him not to mention that campaign, and the crowd funding they received from it, makes me feeling 'unhelpful' in their minds... :/
item.content:encoded: Hmmm…I backed Good Kid, along w. others, of course, on Kickstarter…and for him not to mention that campaign, and the crowd funding they received from it, makes me feeling ‘unhelpful’ in their minds… :/
